mapper.insert: insert into com_dict_index (dictcode, dictname, dftitem) values (#{dictcode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dictname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dftitem, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert all
into com_dict_index (dictcode, dictname, dftitem) values (#{item.dictcode, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.dictname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dftitem, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select 1 from dual
mapper.delete: delete from com_dict_index where 1=1 and dictcode = #{0}
mapper.update:
update com_dict_index
dictname = #{dictname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dftitem = #{dftitem, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where 1=1 and dictcode = #{dictcode, jdbcType=INTEGER}
